link_desc:
Installation:

  1. Download the MIB file from the Pure storage array (from the top "Hamburger menu")
  2. Set the community on the Pure storage array (using the pencil)
  3. Copy MIB file to MIB's directory on the Proxy / Server (CentOS: /usr/share/snmp/mibs)
  4. Install the template using the Zabbix webinterface
  5. Create a device for each controller connecting to the management interface IP
  6. Set the correct {$SNMP_COMMUNITY} = as a Macro

Tested on on Purity 4.8.13 & 4.8.8 with Zabbix 2.2.23

Be aware: there is a issue with SNMP not working on Purity 4.8.3 till 4.8.8
